field.label: The CAAP Message is Generated During a Customer AR Invoice Payment
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: ERP AR Payments Reference Prefix
field.comment: Same Value is shared with CAAP message.

field.label: Generate CAAP as background task?
field.comment: If set to Yes, the user will still recieve a succesful response

field.label: Valid Payment Methods For AR Payments
field.comment: Payment Methods which are set to "Authorised" and "Authorised and capture on ship" won't show in AR Payment options.

field.label: The CAPS Message is Generated During a Customer AR Payments Search

field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: Max Selection For Massaction
field.comment: Leave blank for default value 10, allowed (1 - 50)

field.label: Global Tracking Url
field.comment: Changing this setting will not change existing shipments.( e.g. http://yourdomain.com/{{TNUM}} - URL should contain this value {{TNUM}})
